allies.description: 0-based indexes into of the other allyteams to ally with

hostUserId.description: UserId of the player hosting this AI

aiShortName.description: Short name of the AI library

customStartScriptProperties.description: Additional custom properties to set in engine StartScript for this object, must not collide with existing properties

historyMarker.description: an opaque value to allow history retrieval

name.description: Name of the player, must be unique just like userId

privateBattle.description: Battle informations including secrets to pass to spring for joining the game server. Don't expose secrets to other players.

version.description: Version of the engine to install

restrictions.description: Mapping from unitDefId to the maximum number of units of that type that can be built.

luamsgRegexp.description: When set, battle will generate updates for luamsgs matching this regexp. No updates will be generated if this is not set.

maxBattles.description: The maxBattles might be reported lower (e.g. 0) then currentBattles. Example: autohost is shutting down and doesn't want to accept any new battles.

availableEngines.description: List of available engine versions on autohost

anyOf.title: FinishedUpdate
anyOf.description: The battle finished, generated once per every single player reporting who won.

anyOf.title: EngineMessageUpdate
anyOf.description: A message from the engine, e.g. some ip is trying to connect.

anyOf.title: EngineQuitUpdate
anyOf.description: The engine process for battle has quit cleanly, no more updates will be sent for this battle.

anyOf.title: EngineCrashUpdate
anyOf.description: The engine process for battle has crashed, no more updates will be sent for this battle.

details.description: Optional, short, details of the crash.

playerNumber.description: Player number in the game, can be useful for custom commands

anyOf.title: LuaMsgUpdate
anyOf.description: This update is generated only for messages matching luamsgRegexp set in the battle start script.

timestamp.description: time at which the message was received by the server

hasMissedMessages.description: set to true when the marker sent doesn't match any message stored by the server.
